CORE_AI.NAME: Combative
CORE_AI.DESC: Whenever one of [OWNER]'s arguments is destroyed, deal <style="Scalable">[STACKS]</style> damage to a random enemy argument.

CORE_DECKARD.NAME: Collected
CORE_DECKARD.DESC: At the start of [OWNER]'s turn, this argument gains [STACKS] Poise.

CORE_NO_ABILITY.NAME: Boring
CORE_NO_ABILITY.DESC: This argument has no special effects.

TALISMAN_RESOLVE.NAME: Talisman of Renewal
TALISMAN_RESOLVE.DESC:
At the start of [OWNER]'s turn, increase a random non-core friendly argument's resolve by <style="Scalable">[STACKS]</style>.

At the end of [OWNER]'s turn, if this argument has 4+ stacks, create a copy of this argument and halve both arguments' stacks.
